td.p: A free, open-enrollment, public charter school for pre-k through high school
Caring, qualified teachers and staff working in a collaborative environment
Three campuses serving families in the greater Galveston, Texas City, and Bay Area communities
Arts, sports, community and travel enrichment activities
Diverse academic curriculum strong in math, science and technology
Leadership, character, college and career development
